name: Ugadi Celebration
description: Celebrate the Telugu New Year with traditional rituals, festive meals, and cultural programs in Vijayawada.

name: Tirupati Brahmotsavam
description: A grand religious festival at the Tirumala temple, featuring processions, rituals, and thousands of devotees.

name: Vizag Beach Festival
description: A vibrant celebration by the beach with food stalls, folk performances, music concerts, and sand art displays.

name: Lepakshi Festival
description: A cultural heritage event highlighting Andhra's classical dance, crafts, and the architectural marvel of Lepakshi temple.

name: Rayalaseema Food Festival
description: Taste the fiery and flavorful dishes of Rayalaseema with cooking demos, stalls, and folk entertainment.
